title: How can a person with long hair wipe their head in Wudu? assim al hakeem JAL
transcript:
[Questioner] from Bangladesh. My question is, you showed in one of your videos,   how can a person with long hair 
or wipe his or her hair in Wudhu. It was something like putting both hands in 
the middle of the head and going downwards.   So can you please show again how it 
is done so that I can be certain. Jazak Allahu Khairan.
Wa Jazakum. I don't think I can do this to my head because 
I've just finished hamming it, anyhow the first   well-known way of doing it is going from the 
front to the back and from the back to the front.   The second way of doing it is with 
wet hands putting it on the middle   of the head and going downwards, that's it,   you don't have to do this and this, no just doing 
it this way, and this does the job Insha Allah.
